A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
What should be rich in symbolism like space ship princess Leah\, the leprechaun ice foxes\, the little stable boy\, or how the emo guy kills the most powerful dark lord what tries to pass as brilliant sneakery etc. fail to outlive their obviously exciting introductions. 

Falls back on old situations and plot premises\, tugging at the strings of nostalgia are just mildly entertaining. 

But it's beautifully shot\, acting was good and the attempt to create real world heros was cool.
